public class RootFinderGuiController
extends java.lang.Object
the GUI controller for root finder

  • Method Details

    • buttonPressed

      public void buttonPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      action performed when the button is pressed to calculate roots, which calls the master to create slave threads to calculate the roots
      Parameters:
      event - Action event object used to access info about the event
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - exception occurs if the thread has been interrupted

      public void initialize()
      called by FXMLLoader to initialize the controller
